subject: Re: Changes for the quote platform relating to our new Advantage Plus product

full_threads.body: @heath Just gonna close this one.

Hi Heath, re the t's and c's - correct. We'd like them included in the PDF sent to customers at booking confirmation. We will need to be diligent, that if we change the t's and c's on the website, that we have you amend the PDF at the same time

With the PDF did you also see the couple of wording changes, plus the need to change 15% to 40% in yesterdays email?

Kind Regards,

David McLean

General Manager

Advantage Property Styling

Follow us on:



P 02 9310 1611 | M 0410 567 287

Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019

http://www.advantagestyling.com.au/

Hi David, 

Confirming we have completed tasks 1, 2 and 4.

Regarding item 3, so am I correct that you want us to embed the ts and cs in the actual PDF instead of linking to them. If they choose Advantage Plus, we are to also include those within the PDF? 

If this is the case, we just need to make sure that if the T's and C's are updated on the website, they must also be updated on the PDF. These are independent of each other. 

Does that sit ok with you?

Hi Heath, we had a chance to review the changes in todays call with our Sales team and see how it appears on a mobile device. The team were very supportive of the changes.

Can we ask you to make some slight amendments

1/ are we able to widen the hover box on page 1 and put in returns, so that it doesn't appear as 1 long continuous paragraph (see suggestion below). I'm not sure if widening it will impact on mobile viewing. Also on a mobile device, when you scroll down, this hover box moves from sitting above the Advantage Plus box to below it, obstructing the customers view of the green accept button. If we are able to find a way it doesn't obstruct the green accept button please.



2. We felt the pop up on page 2 was too big, so we've amended the wording to make it shorter. In re-designing it, can we amend the pop so that it doesn't take up so much of the screen, ie a smaller box and reduce the font size. Also on a mobile device the red and green buttons at the bottom don't fit, so half the green button is cut off. They may need to be stacked on top of each other to be mobile friendly. I've attached the new words, without the green and red buttons, but we still need them in

3. I'll call you shortly to go through point 7 that you weren't able to action last night. I've attached the PDF that I'm referring to. It's what is automatically generated to a customer when they complete their booking. We were looking to make some wording changes in that document and have the t's and c's appear after that. Rental t's and c's to every customer. Rental t's and c's and Advantage Plus t's and c's to those that only choose Advantage Plus. Is that possible?

4. Could we change the word envision to envisage, which is under the style till you sell heading on page 1 of the quote platform

Thank you

Kind Regards,

David McLean

General Manager

Advantage Property Styling

Follow us on:



P 02 9310 1611 | M 0410 567 287

Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019

http://www.advantagestyling.com.au/

Thanks Heath. I just had a look and see that the changes are live and we can show our sales team tomorrow morning. I'll have a closer look and let you know any minor tweaks needed. I'm free after the call with the Sales team from 915 am.
Thanks again for making this happen so quickly

Kind Regards,

David McLean

General Manager

Hi David, 

We managed to get through everything, except: 

  • The terms and conditions being attached as a PDF
  • The last request in section '7' has us confused. I will call you in the morning to discuss, let me know a good time?
@heath Sure, does the popup occurs only on the advantage plus being selected?

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body: @joel - any way you can squeeze this in today? Cheers

Hi Heath,
I like all the suggestions you made to Dan around our new Advantage Plus product. Particularly the idea around the pop up for t’s and c’s. If we were ever tested in Court, we have a much stronger case of success if the t’s and c’s are viewed before accepting (the pop up will achieve this) as opposed to them having to click a hyperlink to see them (like we do now).
Attached please find the new t’s and c’s document relating to this product that we will need loaded onto the hyperlink.
The second attachment is the changes that we would like made to the quote platform for the new Advantage Plus product. Please give me a call if you can’t understand anything that we’ve prepared.
Could you let me know a timeframe for completion. We have a call with our sales team in the morning at 830am and would love to be in a position to show them the new quote, if it can be ready.

Kind Regards,

David McLean
General Manager
Advantage Property Styling
